page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: Home life within the area is often affected by the{large number of {unemployed. }Whereas no family actually suffers real hardship there is a difference between families where the parents are in work and those families where the parents are unemployed. We found no real difference in the families material goods e.g. all families had televisions, freezers etc. and most families, where there were qualified drivers, also had cars. One indication of a lower income we did find was in the pets kept by these families. Whereas most working families had large pets e.g. dogs,cats etc. we found that the most popular pet for unemployed families was a goldfish the reason we felt for this was the expense of keeping large pets.
